question: Alex has 65 square meters of melon field. There are 81 melons per square meter. Alex can harvest his melons every 1 months. How many melons can Alex harvest within a year?
answer:
Alex has 81*65= <<81*65=5265>>5265 melons on his field.
Alex can harvest his melons 12 / 1 = <<12/1=12>>12 times per year
Therefore Alex can harvest 5265*12 = <<5265*12=63,180>>63,180 melons per year.
#### 63,180
